ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They *really* need to incorporate risk into this equation.  No risk, no credit.  That way at least kill stealers would have to work for their steals.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Sep 1999, Woland Vildhufvud wrote:
>
> Again a tough battle began with Hatar swinging left and right. After a short
> while most group members are down to half health, but so is Hatar and we
> feel that we are winning, when suddenly BOOM and Hatar falls dead to the
> ground. Cheers break out but I think wtf no exp!
> I look around and, oh yes, there he is the high lvl KS nuker standing at
> safe distance.

They *really* need to incorporate risk into this equation. No
risk, no credit. That way at least kill stealers would have
to work for their steals. Letting them steal without taking
any risk is just ridiculous.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
